```{r}
#| label: load-pkgs
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#| label: load-data
#| message: false

taylor_album_songs <- readr::read_csv('data/taylor_album_songs.csv', show_col_types = FALSE)
taylor_all_songs <- readr::read_csv('data/taylor_all_songs.csv', show_col_types = FALSE)
taylor_albums <- readr::read_csv('data/taylor_albums.csv', show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
#| label: create-plot
#| message: false

taylor_all_songs <- taylor_all_songs(mutate)

ggplot(taylor_all_songs, aes(x = single_release, y = transmission, 
                           fill = transmission)) +
  geom_density_ridges(show.legend = FALSE, alpha = 0.5) +
  facet_wrap(~mpg_type, ncol = 1, scales = "free_y") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(strip.background = element_rect(fill = "grey25"),
        strip.text = element_text(color = "white", face = "bold")) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 60, 10), labels = seq(0, 60, 10)) +
  scale_fill_colorblind() + 
  labs(title = "MPG by transmission",
       x = "MPG",
       y = "Transmission",
       caption = "Source: Environmental Protection Agency, 2021")

```
